attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An English parliment run soly by elected English MP,s to make laws, raise taxes, and have full control over the day to day running of our country.To bring the English into parity with the rest of the UK. England run by the English for the English,

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
